about_the_game:
Muchacho Bean is an action-roguelite Endless Runner about a bean fighting back against his creator - the evil Professor Tech-o.
Shoot your way through an army of drones and other creatures with a huge arsenal of weapons and gadgets while the Professor puts your skills to the test.

Key Features
  • Endless Mode with over 530 procedurally generated levels, scaling difficulty, roguelike power-ups, boss fights and random events
  • Challenge Mode with 90 handcrafted levels that will test your skills
  • Craft 48 unique Upgrades and create your favorite Loadout
  • Unlock 7 upgradeable Blaster-Modes with special mechanics
  • Dive into 5 beautiful Biomes, each with unique enemy designs.. and funny faces!
  • High-quality Pixel Art and animations
  • 3 epic Soundtracks


Endless Mode: Lead Muchacho Bean through endless cliffs, gather powerful Upgrades, become stronger and survive against the Professor's army of minions.




Up for a Challenge? Try out the Challenge Mode with over 90 hand-crafted levels requiring precision and skill.




Unlock all Blaster-Modes: Fight your way through the Professor's minions by using the various projectiles of your Blaster.




Choose your style: want to be a Banana and whack some enemies with a frying pan? Then over 35 high-quality character & weapon skins are at your disposal!

Lore



In search of Anima and its effects on living beings, a mysterious alien called Professor Tech-o is invading planets all over the galaxy with his army of drones.
As a result of an Anima experiment, Muchacho Bean was raised in Professor Tech-o's laboratory, hidden in a desert mountain deep inside the Valley of Endless Tears.
Professor Tech-o swiftly discovered Muchacho Bean's exceptional abilities. With supernatural reflexes and strength, Muchacho Bean became the focus of the Professor's experiments, as he sought to uncover the secrets behind his remarkable powers.
However, after finding out about the Professor's experiments with other living beings, Muchacho Bean decides to steal a few of his prototype gadgets from the laboratory and barely manages to escape.
Now hunted by the Professor's minions, Muchacho Bean must wield his newfound gadgets to confront his creator and break free from his control once and for all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or higher
  • Processor: intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (HD) graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or higher
  • Processor: intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMBean RTX 9001 Tech-o series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended.

Shoot your way through an army of drones and other creatures with a huge arsenal of weapons and gadgets while the Professor puts your skills to the test.
